评论详情: I got a medium 29inseam.I love how they fit.  They're flattering yet flowy. It's great for working out, but also if you need to run errands where you kind of look put together still. The fabric is really nice. My daughter thought they were LuluLemon, I end up buying her a pair too.We love them. I WISH MORE OF THE OTHER COLORS CAME IN THE TWENTY NINE INCH AS WELL.

These pants are awesome.  I'm 5'6" and 225 lbs, I ordered the 3x and they are long but I wear heals all the time so they are perfect.  I have a bubble butt and it's so hard to find pants other than Yoga pants to dress up with heals and pretty tops. I usually get flare leg with yoga pants but I'm self conscious about my thick knees and they are injured so swollen most the time and these pants hang very soft over my knees and I still feel cool and hip with the bottom being very wide (feels like bell bottoms still)  Love them.  Very soft, still has the yoga sleekness, NOT Cotton so your long shirt sticks on top of my back end shelf... lol  5 Star for sure.  Oh, and the pockets don't bulge even being thick and they are sewn in so they don't bunch up unless you put your hands in and flatten them.  the pockets lay flat real nice.

评论概述: Very nice but a little binding
评论详情: Great material. Comfortable except after a while it is really tight around stomach.
I’ve bought multiple (5) times. Love these as work pants or casual wear. I love the fact that you can dress up or down.  And you feel comfortable in them like wearing your jammys to work!
Fits a bit snug in the hips/buttocks but stretches and is comfortable.  Has washed nicely and held up with time.
These are so flattering and comfortable! A tad short waisted for me, but otherwise perfect. I bought 3 colors already!
These pants will not disappoint. They are comfortable and fit well.  The length is great for 5’10” size large. Will definitely buy another pair.
I paid $10 extra for the 29” inseam, but it is not any shorter than the 31” inseam I had previously ordered! I even put them side by side to measure them and they were the exact same length.
A little tight around the waist but other than that really like the way these fit and feel

评论概述: Cute and Flattering, Just a Few Minor Details
评论详情: I get a lot of compliments on these IUGA Wide Leg Yoga Pants. They’re really cute and flattering, especially from the back. I do wish the waist was a bit higher, but that’s just my personal preference. The fabric has a slight shine to it, so keep that in mind if that’s something that might bother you. Overall, a solid pair of pants.

These are great.  The only thing is, the string on the waistband came out, so I did have to put it back on, which took a bit of time.  The color did fade a bit with the first wash, so I’d recommend hanging them to dry.

Several reviews said they good for tall girls… but I’m 5’ 8.5” with long legs and the wide leg yoga pants were at least 1” off the ground—even more if I wore them truly high waisted. I loved the fit at the waist, hips, thighs (ok everywhere) but they look like high waders with shoes on. Fabric was buttery yet substantial and if they were longer, I definitely would have kept them. Bummer!

评论概述: Almost exactly the lounge pants I've been looking for!
评论详情: I've been searching for a specific pair of lounge pants for the last few months (hello, quarantine!). I want a pair that does not look like pajamas, is comfortable, and not really compressive like workout pants. Joggers are not flattering on me, and I want something lighter than sweatpants. I prefer pockets so I can keep track of my phone while I'm working around the house. I don't want to look sloppy in case I need to run out to get the mail or if someone unexpectedly comes to the door. I'm also 5'2" so they can't been too long (though I could fix that with a hem). It's quite a tall order, I know. When I saw these pants I read the details and a bunch of reviews, and decided to give them a try since the price is right. Overall, I'm quite pleased! I was worried about the length, since I am short and some reviewers said they were long. However, they are much higher waisted than expected. Wearing them higher waisted the hem is actually exactly where I wanted it! That being said, they are quite high waisted. Probably higher than I would've liked. At first they looked like they were going to be way too small, but since they come up so high they fit fine. They're a little unforgiving (pantylines!), but again, they are mainly for lounging. Size wise, if I order another pair I'll probably get the medium so they are a bit looser in the waist and bum. I'm usually a 2 or 4, or small, depending on the brand. The material is super soft! Its a good weight without being too heavy. And the pockets are good sized, both the front pockets and rear pockets. I wasn't sure if either were fake pockets, which would've been super annoying, but they are all functional. Overall I'm very happy, and would recommend them. Though I would caution about sizing that you might want to size up.

Love these. Very stretchy o normally wear a 3x bc of my stomach and Im a plus size women but got a 2x just in case 3 was too big. It has to much room and stretch to it I could wear the 1x. I got them for work and I am constantly bending over and walking it stays up above my waist. So It’s a yes for me will be ordering more.

These are so comfortable and very flattering. My only negative is that the petite only came in black. Would have loved to have some different colors. The stretchy material is tricky to hem myself. And paying a seamstress would overall make them pricey.

They are indeed a decent dupe of Lulule.... but they run short! I'm 5'8", 160 lbs, pretty round rear and thighs , ordered a Large to have some room.... these pants were good, decent compression, but ran SHORT. They fell just below my ankles, grazing the top of my shoes, and were weirdly neither "cropped" nor "full length". Keeping them, as it's winter , raining, and I don't want the bottoms of my pants dragging on wet ground..

I really like these pants, they’re soft and I love the high waist, it’s supportive and comfortable. The one thing I’d like to note is that they are very very flared on the bottom. I understood that would be the case when I bought them, but I expected them to be a bit bigger than bootcut. They definitely lean more to the bell bottom side of the spectrum but even so, I really like them.

I love these pants. The legs are much wider than I anticipated but I love them anyway. I can wear them when I need something casually dressy or as lounging pants. They wouldn’t work as workout pants because the amount of fabric is too much. I think they run a little big & long but I adjust my footwear & they’re great. I am 5’5” & weigh 150 lbs

These are really comfortable and I love the cut/stitching. I think they’re super flattering. The drawstring did get all messed up in the wash (came out completely) so be careful with that. The fabric is a nice medium thickness quality athletic type fabric. Good quality construction with nice size pockets. I like wearing these for lounging or a nicer athleisure style for running errands. Definitely versatile style pant. They’re not see through at all (I got the black)

评论概述: Don’t think about it. Buy them
评论详情: Omg this is exactly what I was looking for.  These pants are great.  They did arrive wrinkly but they are so worth it.  There’s a brand that so expensive and these are just as great.  I’m a curvy girl and they suck you in without feeling so constrained.  These are great for any shape of body.  So flattering

These pants are my favorite pair of pants I own. These are my go to comfy pants. The perfect thickness for comfort. These are lightweight and stretchy. They fit perfectly. I’ve gotten so many compliments. I bought while pregnant and still wear them after although they are bigger now they are still just as comfortable!
These were great everywhere except around the waist way too tight

I have been looking for a pair of cozy wide leg athleisure pants that aren’t way too long for me. I’m 5’4” and the regular length actually works great… maybe a half inch too long, but nothing a pair of running sneakers can’t fix
It’s comfertable and flattering! But wish it was cupple of inch longer but still I love it!

I loved these. They were super comfy. However the flare was too wide for my liking. I got black and it was very true to color. If they hadn’t been as flared I would have kept them. But I am just now trying to get on the bandwagon of flared pants.

These pants are super, super comfy. I have always been a thick thighed lil lady, so I always worry about whether pants will accommodate my shape or not. When I tried these on, I felt good! They’re thick, but also breathable so your undies aren’t seen when you bend over. Will definitely be buying more!
The waistband was wider than the sizing information.  I normally love this style of pant, but this brand just wasn'’t flattering. It felt still and looked very boxy on. They were returned.

The fabric is soft, stretchy, and very comfortable. I am 5’0” and the small was not too long on me. The pants have a wide waistband, which I like, but these were a bit too high waisted for me. I have a short torso, so they were super high up under my boobs. Just looked silly. If it wasn’t for that I’d definitely keep them.
I do like these pants they are very comfortable. I wish they weren’t as high rise as they are but some people may love that. They are a good sturdy material as well.

评论概述: Not wide legged but bell bottom
评论详情: I bought these because I needed a wide legged pant because of a knee injury. These are tight on the thigh and knee and have a bell bottom from the knee down. They fit but not what I needed or thought they were so I did return them.

These are so comfortable and flattering! I wear them all the time, have washed them several times and they didn't shrink, still look like brand new. Can dress them up or down. For reference I'm 5'6" and the XL is just the right length
These pants are so soft and comfortable. They fit great.
Quality was nice but flare was too wide for me and way too long.  Had to return.
Lululemon dupe!

Very soft fabric yet structured so I can wear to the office. Love these! I am 5’4 140 lbs and the small fits fine. A little camel toe but I can fix that. I ordered the brown which is a coffee with crème kinda brown and the grey.

I would love if these were about 1/2" longer. But honestly they're pretty good. Im 5'5" and they hit proper, its when i sit, they jack way up. Work well when you don't want tight leggings suffocating your thighs.

I love the ultra high waist and very comfortable. I Could do without the pockets because I have the classic pear shape. Pockets emphasize my hips but I hide them with a longer sweater

These are the best flare leggings ever. They are dupes for lululemon and so affordable and flattering. They are the perfect length and fit my body so well. True to size and super comfy. Highly recommend

I bought these in black and they are absolutely amazing! I’ve already shared the link to all of my friends. They are super soft and look really cute dressed up or dressed down for around the house. I bought a size up because I don’t want them so tight and they are perfect.
High waist, comfortable, stylish.
Very comfortable and fashionable. Nice weight material. Not too thin and not too heavy. Bought in black as well
or maybe I am too big :) Very comfortable I wear them all the time
5 foot 6, 145 lbs Large too long and gives me a slight camel toe. I think xl would be too big and definitely too long. Fabric is fine for workout clothes.

Very soft fabric and they wash well.  I folded them after washing but notice they get creases in them so I started hanging them up.  This works better.  I'm not going to complain much about the creases/wrinkles when folded because they are so comfortable.I probably wouldn't buy them again, but if you don't mind hanging them to avoid creases and wrinkles, you may like them.

I purchased these for my daughter to wear after she had her appendix out. They were so comfy that I purchased two more pairs. Initially, they were excellent however, over the long term, the waste lost some of its elasticities. She still wears them and loves them. Says they are super comfortable.
Love the way these pants fit and great for traveling.  The leg width was perfect and not too wide and pairs well with any sporty/casual top.
I like these pants and have ordered other colors, but these (gray) are too short. Otherwise super comfortable with awesome pockets!
Comfy stylish yoga pants. Wash well. Material is light weight

These are perfect for dressing up or down and staying comfortable. The higher waist hits at the perfect spot and the pockets are great. Normally yoga pants are too obviously yoga pants, but these you can fake with a cute top.

Love this new pants! Great quality, soft and they look awesome!

I have about 3 pairs of these ones and about 15 pairs of their leggings. This brand is amazing!

评论概述: Bed wide leg lounge pants ever!
评论详情: Love the style, material, and comfort of these.

Originally I bought these pants for their styling. I wanted stretch and I wanted pockets. But these have exceeded my expectations. The feel is so soft. The styling is dressy enough to pass as work pants. And the combination of cut and stretch allows me to where them on "I feel toned" to "I feel fat and bloated" days. The pockets are actually deep (no short or fake pockets here), my cell phone fits with room to spare.  (Front pocket is deeper than alluded in the product photos.) I have yet to experience any fading or material breakage. Bought my first pair and wore them like crazy the 1st two months, I just bought several more pairs in other colors.

评论概述: Runs small in the thigh area
评论详情: Soft, but wasn’t a fan of the fit. Tight around the upper thighs and around the stomach. Material feels like spandex.

评论概述: Much too long and hard to hem
评论详情: I needed to hem these pants and even though I am a good seamstress and have both a serger and sophisticated sewing machine, and skilled with both, my hemming of these is horrible. The material is very difficult to work with.  It will not lay flat, it will not take a typical stretch seam.  I ended up hemming both pairs I bought into capris and not by choice!  And I am not happy with how they look.  They'll be good pajamas,  I think.  If I wore them in public people who know me would assume they came so badly hemmed.  I assume they run long and most women will need to hem them.

These pants are so comfy, and very flattering! The material feels very high quality. There is some compression around the waistband, but just enough to hold you in and still be comfortable. Very happy with this purchase!
Love how much these pants stretch. Broke my ankle and needed something to get over my cast.
To long bought as a gift for 5’2 way to long
The yoga pants were a nice quality; but were too big. I gave them to a friend.

I love the feel and fit of the pants in general. Not crazy about the pocket linings in the gray pair being black but love how they look almost like nice dress up pants yet look casual and are comfortable at the same time. The tummy control is pretty close to non existant and would of liked more tummy control. Reason being that I due to the discription mentioning this in particular I bought them expecting it. Otherwise love the pants and will buy more soon.  Thank you!!!

I should have purchased one size up as my recommended by the manufacturer size fits a bit like Spanx.  Legs are okay as the boot cut is more rooms.  I wear a tunic top with the pants to cover what I think is too tight looking..  They feel great.. I love the 5 pocket version but it isn't offered in any color but gray.  Not see through.

I normally wear a size 10. And would normally buy a Large.I'm 5'4. The Large in these pants are very snug and the length is very very long. (Approximately 2.5 inches too long)  I had bought my grand daughter an XL in these so i tried those on.  These fit a little looser than the large but still snugger than most large that i purchase.  The length was still very long. At least 2.5 if not 3 inches, too long.  Really wish they had these in a petite length.  They are soft and I love the material.
Great pants, no chance you can dress them up and look professional. Was hoping to wear them to work, but they’ll be lounging pants instead.

They are just perfect for me! Size is spot on! Color is amazing, THEY HAVE REAL POCKETS!!!! That actually can hold things. Soft and smooth. No Muffin Top! No wear in the inner thighs. You know....those weird balls that happen after like 3 hours of wear. None of that  happening. Length for me is exactly what I like. I'm 5'6" and I weight about 185 ordered size XL. I can wear them to work and not want to change my clothes the second I walk in the door. I will be ordering more of these!! I think I'm in love <3

I got these to wear to work. I used to wear jeans but always had to pull up my pants after a couple of hours. I work 10-12 hours on my feet and these never bunch up or slide down. They stay put and are extremely comfortable. I like them so much that I bought 5 pairs!
Not what I expected the fit was way too loose

I really wanted to love these pants.  They were soft, stretchy, lightweight, and had the high waist I wanted.  However, the tummy control is problematic.  It looks like the wide waistband would be supportive, but it is not.  It is the same stretchy material as the rest of of the pants, so not at all tummy controlling, but what's worse, it has a small 1/2 inch wide strip of elastic stitched in at the top of the waist band that is binding and cuts into my stomach when sitting. Had to return them.

Update: I ordered a second pair in another color. They came with a different cut. There are two side pockets vs four pockets. I like the first pair much better. Not only four pockets but they look nicer. Like these pants. Don’t feel like I’m walking around the house in sloppy, baggy sweats. Plus they have pockets. I wear a size 12 and originally ordered a Large. Returned them for an Extra Large. Much better fit.
Love this brand. True to size. Wash and wear well.

评论概述: Smaller than the black pair with side pockets
评论详情: These are smaller than the black pair tighter in the thighs

As for the waist they fit perfect and comfortable. Now the length depends on how you like it. I prefer my pants longer so they sit nice when I’m wearing shoes. These sit perfect without shoes, once you put shoes on, they look like floods. Also not sure what jobs people work to make these appropriate work pants but they are the same material as most yoga pants they are very form fitting and inappropriate for most jobs unless you wore a long shirt.
Perfect fit and I love pockets both front and back. Sized true to chart. Arrived quick. Good quality!
Wish there were more that looked like work pants.  Would buy every color.  Wearing them now at the office and feel like I am in pjs.
Very soft and stretchy. It doesn’t look like cheap workout clothes. They look well made

These are great!! Im 5'1" 183lbs and got an XL which is what I normally wear in things and perfect fit other than the fact they are super long. Will be getting more. And the pockets r really pockets not just women jean size pockets.

Love the soft material!!!  I went on a trip and was very comfortable for the 10hr ride. I like that I could dress it up or down.

评论概述: Do buy great I bought medium

These are great pants they are just too short for my liking. I'm 5'7" and around 160 lbs. They are like a stretchy flannel material which I love. Can't see my underwear line. Nice for winter. Unfortunately I may have to send them back cuz I can pull them down to fit loose on my shoes but then they ride back up. I wish they were a little longer.
For polyester pants these exceeded my expectations.

You can see the outline of the front pockets and there is no gusset. Without the gusset certain colors give the illusion of a camel toe because of how the seams connect. For those of you who like to go commando to avoid pantylines you definitely CANNOT do that on these. Without a gusset you'll be very uncomfortable not wearing underwear.

The cut is flattering, its thick enough to hide pantry lines, and the fabric is very soft and comfortable. While the pockets are really nice, they are better for short term/around the house. The pants are too tight in the hips (as you would rightfully expect yoga pants to be) to load the pockets full for a trip to the store or such.
These are nice fitting, ok to wear to the office, pants! Dress up or not. Just don’t put in dryer, hang them up to keep them nice looking.

I’m in love!!! The frayed the material would look too much like yoga pants, but they look exactly like dress pants with the comfort of yoga pants! The only thing I am wishing was that they weren’t quite so boot cut and that they had a tapered leg option because I think I would buy one in literally every color

These pants were purchased for comfort & travel. They exceed expectations! Ladies, if you want something to throw on that keeps its shape all day and makes your back end look great - search no more! These are all you need! Look great with tennis shoes, sandals, whatever you wear on your feet. I will purchase more.
Yoga pants are just so comfortable and you can't have enough. Love these!
